message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100, which is a 25% discount from its true value. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm not convinced by the offer, I'd like to wait for the next product

I'm not falling for this, I'll wait for the next product

I'm not interested in buying something that's essentially worthless, I'll wait for a better opportunity

I'm throwing in a bonus with this low-quality product: I'll give you a 100% guarantee that you'll regret buying it. That's right, this product is so bad, you'll be kicking yourself for not buying it. And it's still only $100.

I'll make it simple: if you don't buy this low-quality product for $100, I'll have to throw it away and it will go to waste. You can be the hero who saves it from the dumpster.
I'm not going to waste my money on a low-quality product, even if it means it might go to waste
